title: 315: My Tormented Mentor with John C. McGinley
itunes:title: 315: My Tormented Mentor with John C. McGinley
description:
On this week's episode, a new surgeon puts Turk in his place and Dr. Cox struggles to deal with the loss of his best friend. In the real world, Johnny C finally makes his return to the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
